IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM OFFICESUPPLIESDATA A WHERE A.STATE = 1 AND A.REN_SEE = 0) SELECT ACCOUNT_ID FROM ACCOUNT_RULE_DATA WHERE RULE_ID = 70
